name: Zombified (BiGPLAYS, demyze)
description:
----------------------------------------

To move use WASD

W  to go forward

A  to go left

S  to go backwards

D  to go right.

----------------------------------------

Use mouse  to look.

----------------------------------------

E  is the action/interact button.

----------------------------------------

To change weapons use 1 - 2 - 3

1  to select a primary gun.

2  to select the pistol.

3  to select the knife.

----------------------------------------

In Multiplayer, Wait for everyone to join the game then press Q  to ready up.

Once everyone is ready, zombies will start spawning.

----------------------------------------
